channel.title: PORTFOLIO on Void Creative Studio
channel.description: Recent content in PORTFOLIO on Void Creative Studio

item.title: PENNY PUSHER
item.description: A commissioned piece for MindWorks. A bespoke skill-based game both designed and fabricated by Void Creative Studio.

item.title: BREATHE
item.description: “Just breathe…" An emotive tale of hope. A beautiful collaboration with Jimmy Herrity and Tommy.

item.title: TANGLED GAME OF LOVE
item.description: Energetic Animated lyric video for “Vicky Pasion - Tangled Game of Love”.

item.title: ROLLERSNAKE
item.description: Rollersnake, an illustrated book for children. The tale of a snake who cannot skate… yet!

item.title: SOLITUDE
item.description: Solitude, an illustrated story. The tale of Blue and Joy.

item.title: DARKMOON BORDER
item.description: “So we’ll dance with the moon." Audio-reactive music video exploring the human condition.

item.title: BLINDSIDED
item.description: An Illustrated & Animated music video. A journey into the soul.

item.title: TOGETHER
item.description: An interactive installation promoting environmental change. An opportunity for the general public to reflect and contemplate every-day decisions.

item.title: PHALE
item.description: Rasing awareness of the effects of plastic pollution. An interactive humpback whale follows your every move.

item.title: THE ENGINE ROOM
item.description: A commissioned piece for SONY MUSIC. An Audio / Visual installation to raise awareness over Mental Health Awareness Week.
